promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple cat steel-type pokemon wearing a grey crown. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Desertcrown, a a massive simple cat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Sonicboom, Cat Fleas. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "steel" or "Desertcrown". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, cat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Abundant in arid terrains, this colossal feline titan utilizes Sonicboom to hunt and battles pests with Cat Fleas.
